author: andschwa

comments.author: daviwil
comments.body: Nice!  Does this mean this works on OS X now, or just that it should work soon?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I built and ran it on OS X last night :smile: However, I made some changes in `monad` that aren't quite tested on OS X yet... let me go do that.

comments.author: daviwil
comments.body: Either way, that is supremely awesome!

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
Just tested, still working on OS X, and the majority of our Pester tests pass too. The native tests fail, but it's a failure of a test itself, not the library.

It also compiles on Windows, I'm just having to adjust our guards to get it running. I'm hopeful it'll be soon.

comments.author: daviwil
comments.body: I think you've named this repo incorrectly ;)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I made a point about that actually, that the name was going to be a misnomer very soon :smiley:

title: OS X build compatibility and readme updates
